about_the_game:
My Heart Your Soul is narrative-adventure story set in the Inbetween, the space between one life and the next. You play as Javi, a recently deceased soul who must relive her memories to let go of her grief in order to pass on. With an Angel at your side, uncover the truth behind her story.

Key Features:

A UNIQUE HEARTFELT STORY

  • Take control of Javi as she navigates the ethereal realm of the Inbetween, rediscovering her cherished childhood memories and unearthing long-buried secrets, all in a quest to pass on to the next life.

INTERACTIVE GAMEPLAY

  • An innovative fusion of adventure game elements intertwined with classic RPG mechanics, creating a captivating and immersive experience.

INTERACTIVE MINI-GAMES

  • Explore a variety of engaging activities, from matchcards and Wuxing puzzles to heart-pounding quicktime events. Experience the excitement of the all-new dance feature, where your rhythmic skills take center stage. Get ready to embark on an unforgettable gaming experience filled with diverse and exhilarating mini-games that will keep you entertained.

MYSTERIA AWAITS

  • Dive into the depths of the revamped "Mysteries in Darkness" mini-game, a dungeon crawler that features intensified enemies and bullet hell combat that will test your reflexes and strategic thinking.

A SOUL-STIRRING SOUNDTRACK

  • An immersive and emotionally charged musical composition that leaves a lasting impact, featuring songs that closely tie to the story:
    I'm Still Alive by Rachel Philipp
    Fates Intertwined by Raym
    (Available on All Platforms)

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Major Linux Distribution from 2010
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 capable graphics card
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.6.8
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 capable graphics card
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

name: My Heart Your Soul

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 98, XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024x768 High Color +
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Relive Javi's memories as she embarks on a journey through the Inbetween, in this RPG Story-Driven adventure.
